name: YOMAS
description:
Go to the dark dungeon in search of powerful enemies! Peaceful people need your help!
Arm yourself with various weapons and destroy your enemies! But be careful and attentive, because your run can end abruptly!

YOMAS - is a 2D platform game with RPG elements. As you progress through the game, you will encounter new weapons, potions, and coins. All this is required to destroy enemies and bosses!

Game Features:
-Beautiful pixel graphics
-Different bosses
-Different weapons
-Pleasant soundtrack
